name: Cyclone
description: For the next 2 turns, the opponent receives 1 damage.

name: Empower
description: Receives -1 damage for this round, deals +1 damage for the next round.

name: Flame On!
description: Heals 1 life and deals 1 damage for every time it is hurt.

name: Frost Breath
description: Freezes the opponent, preventing them from using any cards except Fire element for the next round.

name: Frozen Mirror
description: Deals 1 damage and reflects the opponent's Fire element attacks.

name: Ice Shelter
description: Blocks all attacks for this and the next round.

name: Incinerate
description: Deals 1 damage. If the opponent uses an Earth element card, deals another 1 damage.

name: Maelstorm's Gift
description: Permanently buffs all your Air element cards to deal +1 damage.

name: Overheat
description: Buffs your Fire element cards to deal +1 damage and cannot be countered for the next round.

name: Puddle
description: Applies the Wet effect to the opponent for the next 3 rounds, dealing 1 damage each time they use an Air element card.

name: Rebirth Breeze
description: Grants the player the Undying effect for the next 3 rounds. If the player dies during this time, they are revived with 1 HP. The Undying effect is then removed.

name: Regeneration
description: Heals 1 life for this round and again in the next round.

name: Scorch
description: Burns the opponent's played card, preventing it from being used again during the game. Only one card can be burned at a time.

name: Super Speed
description: Deals 1 damage. In the next round, you can see the opponent's move.
